alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Salt Lake Valley; Utah Valley; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 6:06PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Wasatch...south central Salt Lake...northwestern Utah and eastern Tooele Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 606 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Vineyard, or 10 miles northwest of Provo, moving northeast at 35 mph. Additional strong storms are developing across northern Utah County. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Provo, Orem, Lehi, Draper, Spanish Fork, Pleasant Grove, Springville, American Fork, Herriman, Eagle Mountain, Lindon, Alpine, Bluffdale, Cedar Fort, Vineyard, Ophir, Camp Williams, Brigham Young University, Palmyra and Lake Shore. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 260 and 288. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Salt Lake Valley; Utah Valley; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80
